name: FIN_ASST_CASE_APPL_DOC
description: This table contains information about documents applicable for each patient in a financial assistance case record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated patient in the financial assistance case record. Together with FIN_ASST_CASE_ID, this forms the foreign key to the FIN_ASST_CASE_PATIENT table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple documents associated with the financial assistance case record and a specific patient from the FIN_ASST_CASE_PATIENT table.

columns.name: APPLICABLE_DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the document applicable to a patient in the financial assistance case record.
